ThingDef.label: vexilour
ThingDef.description: Vexilour is a rare and highly sought-after fur. It is known for its exceptional warmth and softness, making it a luxurious and comfortable choice for cold weather clothing. Its unique shimmering coloration is prized by collectors and fashion enthusiasts alike. Despite its high price tag, demand for Vexilour remains strong due to its rarity and enduring appeal.
